gstore

Class BasicStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • gstore.BasicStore

  • public class BasicStore
extends Object
    BasicStore is a simple graph oriented API on top of Lucene. Objects stored are expressed as OGDL trees (no cycles supported inside objects). Non leaf nodes are treated as fields, with their paths used as field names. Free text and field content searches are supported. Fields can have a type, if defined in schema.g or through the setType() function. Each object uses two identification fields, 'id' and 'uid', and one timestamp field, 'time'.
